txt.en: Give the shchi to dwarf explorers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
An oven can be found at the feast hall in Vérnozal.\n\nYou should cook shchi for dwarf explorers at the oven.
Cured pork and hearty vegetables can be found at the feast hall in Vérnozal.\n\nYou should collect cured pork and hearty vegetables.
'It is good, is it not?! Ha, yes of course it is good! May it keep your belly full and the bellies of all the explorers full as well. I will try to make some more before I see you again, my friend!'

'Ah, good [placeholder]! I would recommend that you do not venture too far into Gundabad on an empty stomach, my friend! You should try my shchi! Ah, I do not have anymore though.\n\n'Well, you could make some more! I will tell you how and I am sure the ingredients for it can be found inside the Hall of Vérnozal. If you would be kind to make more than will fill you, I am sure the other explorers here would be grateful to receive some shchi too.'
Explorers in Gundabad will need a good meal or two as they search the ancient depths beneath the mountains.
Rúzat can be found at Steepset in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Rúzat.
Dwarf explorers can be found in Vérnozal.\n\nYou should give the shchi you cooked to the dwarf explorers.
